projects.title: MERN Restaurant order App
projects.description: A full-stack application that allows customers to book a table and provides an admin with a dynamic dashboard interface to manage reservations. The admin can interact with customer orders seamlessly, streamlining the entire booking and order management process.

projects.title: Weather API
projects.description: An application to display weather forecasts based on real-time data obtained through the OpenWeather API, with the addition of extra information for activities.

projects.title: OpenSoundHub
projects.description: A full-stack project developed in online collaboration with a backend programmer. I was responsible for the frontend development, focusing on building the website and tackling challenges related to the integration between the frontend and backend. I successfully overcame these challenges by understanding the type of data that needed to be exchanged between the frontend and backend, thanks to effective communication

projects.title: Games
projects.description: A website that includes a quick registration process and the ability to play Tic-Tac-Toe and Connect Four. The more you win, the higher you climb the leaderboard, with the goal of reaching the top.
